title: .NET manifest resource format
content:
Currently I'm writing a parser for .NET files and stuck on manifest resources.

My main resources:

  • Huge documentation
  • Short summary

For resource format I have found this project made in 2005, all samples have similar structure as described in that project, but I believe it was based on version=1 resources, but now all samples have version=2 resources, structure somewhat similar but different.

I would like to ask for references into resource format or Windows header files with required C/C++ structures to be used or anything else that migth be useful.
